Columbia Dining has opened five new locations in the past two years

Grace Dodge Dining Hall

Chef Don’s Pizza Pi

Opened before fall 2021

Chef Mike’s Sub Shop

Opened 2021-22

Opened spring to fall 2023

Faculty House

The Fac Shack

Ferris Booth Commons

JJ’s Place

John Jay Dining Hall

Note: Only Morningside campus’ dining halls are shown.

Graphic by Ana Pekec
